Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-61662 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-61662 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package grub2 is earlier than 2.06-16, affected by CVE-2025-61662
